name: Back to Nature
overview: Welcome to the farm in the forest! Help Gert the cockerel, Bla the donkey, Rosi the pig and Susi the sheep to help find their friend Tom the cat. He has probably lost his way in the forest! The four friends set off and experience a number of different adventures along the way. They need your help and that of the bear, the master of the forest, to overcome obstacles to find Tom. They arrive at an abandoned house, have to repair a boat, catch fish, prepare wood, make a fireplace and cook their dinner. Can you help them find their friend Tom?
